Posts.Content: I lost my hair from chemo last December. i bought a wig but only wore it as a hat when i went out as Canadian winters are cold. I did the henna tatoo thing and proudly wore a t- shirt which  said "I'm too sexy for my hair" It came in a beautiful white an'd I'm not going to dye it Dianne
Posts.Title: Hair Loss with Cytoxan and Taxotere Therapy
